oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Epidemiology and Control of L. Hardjo in the Netherlands
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Franken, P.
van Wuijckhuise, L.
Hartman, E. G.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Leptospira hardjo
bulk milk monitoring
infection status
control program
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In 1984 infections with Leptospira hardjo were first detected in dairy cattle and man in the Netherlands. In 1988 a program to  monitor the infection status of dairy farms was started.Presented are our experiences with:- bulk milk monitoring of L. hardjo- the origin of detected new infections on farms- an experimental control program
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1992: Volume 3; 267-270
